abilities.name: My Will Be Done
abilities.rule: Once per battle round, one unit from your army with this ability can use it when it is targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that usage of that Stratagem by 1CP.

abilities.name: Implacable Resilience
abilities.rule: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

abilities.name: Resurrection Orb
abilities.rule: Once per battle, while the bearer is leading a unit, at the end of any phase, it can resurrect that unit if it is on the battlefield. When you do, that unit’s Reanimation Protocols are activated, reanimating D6 wounds rather than D3 when doing so. You cannot resurrect more than one unit per turn.

wargear_abilities.name: Resurrection Orb
wargear_abilities.rule: Once per battle, while the bearer is leading a unit, at the end of any phase, it can resurrect that unit if it is on the battlefield. When you do, that unit’s Reanimation Protocols are activated, reanimating D6 wounds rather than D3 when doing so. You cannot resurrect more than one unit per turn.

wargear_options: ■ If this model is not equipped with a tachyon arrow, it can be equipped with 1 resurrection orb.

■ This model’s tachyon arrow and Overlord’s blade can be replaced with one of the following: 
◦ 1 staff of light
◦ 1 voidscythe
